artist: Designer: James H. Bowen; Manufacturer: J. & E. Stevens Company, Cromwell, Connecticut, 1843–1950s
inscription:
Inscription and Sticker

on raised area on upper side of platform, engraved: [CREEDMOOR / BANK / PAT NOV 20 1877]
markings: on bottom, on sticker: [#63-18 / x Creedmoor Bank / 6065 1 (circled) / 150 / #53M 4155]
title: Creedmoor mechanical bank
